Invocation Name: switch bot
des:
SwitchBot skill for Amazon Alexa brings you a smart life journey!
 

Hub Mini's preset code library is compatible with more than 5,000 infrared remote control models (with constantly updated). Upgrade your smart life by owning a Hub Mini, make intelligence for your air conditioner, TV, fan, lighting, and so on.

 

You can control the SwitchBot Bluetooth products using our Hub Mini when you are out, or you can directly control the SwitchBot Wi-Fi products remotely.
 

you can voice control SwitchBot products, turn on Bot, open curtain, turn on the TV, and so on. According to the features of different products, voice control can do more things, for example, adjust the temperature to 25 degrees on the air conditioner or change the channel to 12 on TV.

Before using you'll need:
1. Download the SwitchBot app first. 
2. Register for a SwitchBot account and sign in. Then follow the instructions in the app to pair your SwitchBot devices.
3. In the Alexa app, tap More and tap Skills & Games, then search for SwitchBot Smart skill. Enable the skill by linking your SwitchBot account with Alexa. After linking your account successfully, wait until your devices are discovered. Then you can set your SwitchBot devices in the Alexa app.

*Compatibility updates compatibility

(Add your device on the SwitchBot app and discover devices on Alexa)
